nodes.text: The Aldera spaceport was the central public spaceflight facility located in Aldera, the capital city of Alderaan. Princess Leia Organa traveled through the spaceport to get to the Tantive IV in order for her to carry out a humanitarian mission to the Mid Rim planet Wobani to deliver food rations to refugees on the planet. It was considered to be one of the best starports in the Core Worlds.
